document.full_text: japanese nuclear power plant operator tokyo electric power co. (tepco) hopes it will be able to achieve cold shutdown of its crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant within six to nine months, the company said on sunday.
document.title: japan nuclear operator aims for cold shutdown in 6-9 months
lines_and_colors: japanese nuclear power plant operator tokyo electric power co. (tepco) hopes it will be able to achieve cold shutdown of its crippled fukushima daiichi nuclear plant within six to nine months, the company said on sunday.
